TopicTitle: Mod that hides most things until you visit / discover them?

Articles.Content: Hi, love KSP, very new to it. I'm wondering if there is a mod that hides most of the planet details (except perhaps orbit/mass) until you actually visit it, or maybe has the equivalent of low res photos taken from terrestrial telescopes until you visit it with a camera, and only then are the highly detailed maps made available.
ResearchBodies will hide planets until you find them.
Perfect! thanks! That's exactly what I was looking for
